languages.text: {n}В глазах Хейнрикса сверкают опасные искорки.{/n} "Ахиллеас уже долгое время не выходит со мной на связь. Он сгинул на вашем мире, Вольный Торговец. Неужели вы убили моего агента по зову очередной своей прихоти? Впрочем, сейчас мы рассматриваем иные ваши прегрешения".

traits.locale_text: {n}В глаза Хейнрикса сверкают опасные искорки.{/n} "Ахиллеас уже долгое время не выходит со мной на связь. Он сгинул на вашем мире, Вольный Торговец. Неужели вы умерщвили моего агента по зову очередной своей прихоти? Впрочем, сейчас мы рассматриваем иные ваши прегрешения. С Ахиллеасом разберемся позже".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Dangerous sparks flare in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Achilleas has not contacted me for a long time. He vanished on your world, Rogue Trader. Have you killed my agent on yet another one of your whims? But it is your other transgressions that we are addressing at present."
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах Хейнрикса сверкают опасные искорки.{/n} "Ахиллеас уже долгое время не выходит со мной на связь. Он сгинул на вашем мире, Вольный Торговец. Неужели вы убили моего агента по зову очередной своей прихоти? Впрочем, сейчас мы рассматриваем иные ваши прегрешения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Dangerous sparks flicker up in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Achilleas has not contacted me for a long time. He vanished on your world, Rogue Trader. Have you killed my agent on yet another one of your whims? But it is your other transgressions that we are addressing right now."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Dangerous sparks flare in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Achilleas has not contacted me for a long time. He vanished on your world, Rogue Trader. Have you killed my agent on yet another one of your whims? But it is your other transgressions that we are addressing at present."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les yeux d'Heinrix s'illuminent soudainement.{/n} « Achilleas ne m'a plus contacté depuis longtemps. Il a disparu sur votre monde, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Avez-vous tué mon agent sur l'un de vos nombreux coups de tête ? Mais ce sont vos autres transgressions qui nous intéressent à l'heure actuelle. »
languages.original_text: {n}Dangerous sparks flare in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Achilleas has not contacted me for a long time. He vanished on your world, Rogue Trader. Have you killed my agent on yet another one of your whims? But it is your other transgressions that we are addressing at present."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux d'Heinrix s'illuminent soudainement.{/n} « Achilleas ne m'a plus contacté depuis longtemps. Il a disparu sur votre monde, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Avez-vous tué mon agent sur l'un de vos nombreux coups de tête ? Mais ce sont vos autres transgressions qui nous intéressent à l'heure actuelle. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希的目光中跳动着危险的火花。{/n}“阿吉里亚斯已经很久没联系过我了，他在你的世界里不知去向，行商浪人。你是不是再次心血来潮，杀了我的特工？不过，这件事可以先放下，我们目前审判的是其他罪行。”
languages.original_text: {n}Dangerous sparks flare in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Achilleas has not contacted me for a long time. He vanished on your world, Rogue Trader. Have you killed my agent on yet another one of your whims? But it is your other transgressions that we are addressing at present."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的目光中跳动着危险的火花。{/n}“阿吉里亚斯已经很久没联系过我了，他在你的世界里不知去向，行商浪人。你是不是再次心血来潮，杀了我的特工？不过，这件事可以先放下，我们这次审判的是其他罪行。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの目に危険な火花が散った。{/n}「アキレアスから私に長いこと連絡がない。自由開拓者よ、彼はあなたの世界で姿を消した。またも気まぐれで私の諜報員を殺したのかね？だが我々が今話しているのは、あなたの他の罪のことだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Dangerous sparks flare in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Achilleas has not contacted me for a long time. He vanished on your world, Rogue Trader. Have you killed my agent on yet another one of your whims? But it is your other transgressions that we are addressing at present."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの目に危険な火花が散った。{/n}「アキレアスから私に長いこと連絡がない。自由開拓者よ、彼はあなたの世界で姿を消した。またも気まぐれで私の諜報員を殺したのかね？だが我々が今話しているのは、あなたの他の罪のことだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Gefährliche Funken lodern in Heinrix' Augen auf.{/n} "Achilleas hat mich schon ewig nicht mehr kontaktiert. Er verschwand auf Eurer Welt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Habt Ihr meinen Agenten getötet, wieder mal aus einer Eurer Launen heraus? Es geht hier und jetzt aber um Eure anderen Fehltritte."
languages.original_text: {n}Dangerous sparks flare in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Achilleas has not contacted me for a long time. He vanished on your world, Rogue Trader. Have you killed my agent on yet another one of your whims? But it is your other transgressions that we are addressing at present."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gefährliche Funken lodern in Heinrix' Augen auf.{/n} "Achilleas hat mich schon ewig nicht mehr kontaktiert. Er verschwand auf Eurer Welt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Habt Ihr meinen Agenten getötet, wieder mal aus einer Eurer Launen heraus? Es geht hier aber um Eure anderen Fehltritte."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Heinrix echan chispas.{/n} «Hace mucho tiempo que Achilleas no se pone en contacto conmigo. Desapareció en su mundo, Comerciante Independiente. ¿Ha matado a mi agente en otro de sus caprichosos arrebatos? De todos modos, son sus otras transgresiones las que nos atañen ahora mismo».
languages.original_text: {n}Dangerous sparks flare in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Achilleas has not contacted me for a long time. He vanished on your world, Rogue Trader. Have you killed my agent on yet another one of your whims? But it is your other transgressions that we are addressing at present."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Heinrix echan chispas.{/n} «Hace mucho tiempo que Achilleas no se pone en contacto conmigo. Desapareció en su mundo, Comerciante Independiente. ¿Ha matado a mi agente en otro de sus caprichosos arrebatos? De todos modos, son sus otras transgresiones las que nos atañen en este juicio».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in gözlerinde tehlikeli kıvılcımlar çakıyor.{/n} "Achilleas benimle uzun süredir iletişime geçmedi. Senin dünyanda kayboldu Hür Tacir. Her zamanki fevri hareketlerinden birini yapıp onu öldürmüş olabilir misin? Her neyse, şu anda senin diğer suçlarına odaklanıyoruz."
languages.original_text: {n}Dangerous sparks flare in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Achilleas has not contacted me for a long time. He vanished on your world, Rogue Trader. Have you killed my agent on yet another one of your whims? But it is your other transgressions that we are addressing at present."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in gözlerinde tehlikeli kıvılcımlar çakıyor.{/n} "Achilleas benimle uzun süredir iletişime geçmedi. Senin dünyanda kayboldu Hür Tacir. Her zamanki fevri hareketlerinden birini yapıp onu öldürmüş olabilir misin? Her neyse, şu anda senin diğer suçlarına odaklanıyoruz."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
